leaders.name: Brock
leaders.introMessage: My name is Brock and let's rock!

leaders.name: Misty
leaders.winningMessage: You are better than I thought!

leaders.name: Koga
leaders.introMessage: I'm a ninja and my pokemons are toxic!

leaders.name: Blane
leaders.introMessage: I see the fire burning in your eyes!

leaders.name: Giovanni
leaders.introMessage: So! I must say, I am impressed you got here!
leaders.winningMessage: Ha! That was a truly intense fight! You have won!

leaders.name: Lorelei
leaders.introMessage: I am the Ice-type Pokémon Trainer Lorelei. I wonder, will you be able to make me feel the heat of battle?
leaders.winningMessage: But now that you beat us, I expect you to keep on winning! You owe us that much, right?

leaders.name: Bruno
leaders.introMessage: I am Bruno of the Elite Four! Through rigorous training, people and Pokémon can become stronger—without limit. I've lived and trained with my Fighting-type Pokémon! And that will never change!
leaders.winningMessage: Having lost, I have no right to say anything… Go face your next challenge!

leaders.name: Agatha
leaders.introMessage: So you've come! It's not in my character to lose over and over. Give this battle everything you've got!
leaders.winningMessage: You win! I see what the old duff sees in you now. I have nothing else to say. Run along now, child!

leaders.name: Lance
leaders.introMessage: I’ve been waiting for you! I knew that you, with your skills, would eventually reach me here. There's no need for words now. We will battle to determine who is the stronger of the two of us. As the most powerful trainer and as the Pokémon League Champion… I, Lance the dragon master, accept your challenge!
leaders.winningMessage: …It's over. But it's an odd feeling. I’m not angry that I lost. In fact, I feel happy. Happy that I witnessed the rise of a great new Champion!
leaders.losingMessage: My dragons are too much for you!

leaders.name: Champ
leaders.introMessage: Glad you have come this far! Unfortunately I techjoe will obliterate your pokemons!
leaders.winningMessage: Congratulations you are the new Champion!
